metadata.name: I'm not here - Yones Mahmoudi
metadata.description:
It's always been a question for me, do we really exist? After reading a book named "I", I became more interested in being in a challenge related to my artwork. 
The question will remain with the audience from the beginning to the end.  Who am "I"? And do you see me? Why do I deny my existence? Where can I be?

Hope for Iran is a collection of artworks from Iranian artists. 
It is a testimony to the strength of the Iranian people and the diversity of their art.
